name: Sleepy Hollow: Harvest
description:
Play as the headless horseman on a journey to collect the heads of the nearby villagers for your harvest. Bring these delicious fruits back home to plant in your jack-o-lantern farms and reap the rewards of these fully grown pumpkins (be sure to water them). But beware, there are pests emerging from the darkness who want to steal your precious jack-o-lanterns. Stop them and grow the biggest pumpkin farm any headless horsemen has ever seen!

Controls:

Escape - Show pause screen with controls view

WASD/Arrow keys - move

F - attack

E/Space/left click - interact

R/right click - toggle mount

Gamepad is also supported (see pause screen)!
